formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: SIPpeers Synopsis: List SIP peers (text format) Privilege: system,all Description: Lists SIP peers in text format with details on current status. Variables: ActionID: <id> Action ID for this transaction. Will be returned.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -1,6 +1,8 @@ Action: SIPpeers Synopsis: List SIP peers (text format) - Privilege: system,all + Privilege: system,reporting,all Description: Lists SIP peers in text format with details on current status. + Peerlist will follow as separate events, followed by a final event called + PeerlistComplete. Variables: ActionID: <id> Action ID for this transaction. Will be returned.
